title: Txt
description: A short story that takes place over the course of just two hours on a single night but sometimes two hours can seem like a lifetime.Sophie Walsh thinks that her mother is overprotective and worries too much. Carol Walsh sees the world as a dangerous place for her young daughter to grow up. One evening, Carol returns home from a night out to find that her teenage daughter is not there. As Carol tries in vain to make contact in a series of calls and text messages, her fears for her daughter's safety mount.It's every parent's worst nightmare but what if that nightmare came true and what if the reality was worse than you could dream?Txt is the first of a three part series of short stories. The entire series, Txt Xtnded will be released as a single book on 31st October 2012.
author: M.T. Mathieson
